title: Perma banned no warning
body: So I got a perma ban without receiving an email. I believe it is for being toxic. I received no warning. Other than a 15 game chat ban and a 25 game chat ban. I did not ever receive an account ban. Is it possible to get it so I just get a permanent chat ban. And get the account one lifted?

The current system handles punishments in 4 tiers:

1.) 10 game chat restriction
2.) 25 game chat restriction
3.) 14 day ban
4.) Permanent ban

You start at tier 1 for your first punishment, and each punishment after that moves you up to the next tier, regardless of how minor the offense was. However, it is possible to skip tiers if Riot deems your behavior severe enough. This is generally done with things like death threats, racist/homophobic slurs, telling others to commit suicide, etc.

You had already gone through the 2 sets of chat restrictions, so normally your next punishment (this one) would be a 14 day ban. However, telling someone to kill themselves is definitely worthy of an escalation. That kind of behavior is not tolerated at all.
